channel.title: Any Bryan Adams fans?
channel.description:
I think he's definitely the best artist I've heard. With songs like "Summer of '69", "Can't Stop This Thing We Started", and "Here I am" just have that rhythm that sounds right. I got his Greatest Hits CD here somewhere on my computer desk, but can't find it atm :s.
So do you like Bryan Adams? And what other songs/artists would you recommend that are similar to him?
